title: Using 'sein' in the Present Tense
instructions: Fill in the correct form of the verb 'sein' in each sentence.

exercises.question: Ich ___ müde.
exercises.explanation: ‘Ich’ uses the form ‘bin’ of the verb ‘sein’ in present tense.

exercises.question: Du ___ mein Freund.
exercises.explanation: ‘Du’ requires ‘bist’ in the present tense of ‘sein’.

exercises.question: Wir ___ in Berlin.
exercises.explanation: ‘Wir’ uses ‘sind’ as the plural form of ‘sein’.
